dublin_core.dcvalue: During the revision of the American National Standards Institute ANSI C63 19 and the development of the ANSI Telecommunications Industry Association 1083 hearing aid compatibility standards it became evident that additional data concerning user acceptance of interfering magnetic noises generated by wireless and cordless telephones were needed in order to determine the requirements for telecoil coupling compatibility
Journal of the American Academy of Audiology
Telecoil-mode hearing aid compatibility performance requirements for wireless and cordless handsets: magnetic signal-to-noise.
